PropertyBag.Description: This product model can determine a product based on the time of the pre-charge. For example, a pre-charge happening after 6pm can be determined to belong to a "Night Minutes" product
PropertyBag.Name: NightsAndWeekends

Property.Description: Week Segments in this Model A week segment is arbitrarily defined by the customer as a collection of days. A full model should have segments covering all 7 days of the week. Typical segments are "Weekdays" (Mon, Tue, Wed, Thu, Fri) and "Weekends" (Sat, Sun)
Property.Name: WeekSegments
